#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        //cout<<n<<endl;
        pair<string,int> arr[n];
        int pos=0;
        string str;
        char vote;
        int j=0;
        //cin>>str;
        while(j<n)
        {
            cin>>str>>vote;
            //cout<<str<<" "<<vote<<endl;
            int i=0;
            while(i<pos)
            {
                if(arr[i].first==str)
                {
                    pos--;
                    break;
                }
                i++;
            }
            arr[i].first=str;
            if(vote=='+')
            {
                arr[i].second=1;
            }
            else arr[i].second=-1;
            pos++;
            j++;
        }
        /*for(int i=0;i<pos;i++)
        {
            cout<<arr[i].first<<" "<<arr[i].second<<endl;
        }*/
        int i=0;
        int sum=0;
        while(i<pos)
        {
            sum+=arr[i].second;
            i++;
        }
        printf("%d\n",sum);

    }
    return 0;
}
